definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: There was a pomegranate tree near the entrance to the cemetery.
sentences.chinese: 墓園的入口邊上有株石榴樹。

sentences.english: The pomegranate trees in the yard have borne fruit.
sentences.chinese: 石榴樹已經結出果實了。

sentences.english: Nightly she sings on yond pomegranate tree.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚她再遠處的石榴樹上歌唱。

sentences.english: The right tree is pomegranate tree.
